iaik.security.mac

Class CMac

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.crypto.MacSpi
      • iaik.security.mac.CMac
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CMacAES, CMacDESede

    public abstract class CMac
extends javax.crypto.MacSpi
    This class implements a MAC based on a block cipher as specified in NIST Special Publication 800-38B.

    This base class can support block ciphers with a block size of 64 bit and 128 bit.

    The MAC length (Tlen) is the block size of the underlying cipher.

      • engineUpdate

        protected void engineUpdate(byte input)
        Feed a single byte into the MAC.

        For better performance, use engineUpdate(byte[], int, int) and feed in larger blocks.

        Specified by:
        engineUpdate in class javax.crypto.MacSpi
        Parameters:
        input - The input byte.

        Parameters:

        offset - The start index in the buffer.
